lyrics.appearance.advance_line_timing.de: Advance the initial timing of the original lyric line so that word-by-word effects start right after scrolling ends. Closer to Apple Music but may cause the end of a line to cut early.

lyrics.appearance.line_blur_effect.descr: High performance impact. If you encounter performance issues, try disabling this option. Enabled by default.
lyrics.appearance.line_scale_effect.desc: No performance impact. Non-current lines slightly scale down. Enabled by default.
Moderate to high performance impact. If you encounter performance issues, try disabling this option. Enabled by default.
There are currently two lyrics playback implementations
- DOM: Uses DOM elements with the most complete effects but higher performance overhead
- Canvas: Uses Canvas, still under development; great performance but fewer detailed effects
lyrics.appearance.size_preset.descriptio: Set the font size preset for lyrics
lyrics.appearance.word_fade_width.descri:
Adjust the word fade width in lyrics, measured in the width of a full width character, with a default value of 0.5.
If you want to simulate the effect of Apple Music for Android, you can set it to 1.
If you want to simulate the effect of Apple Music for iPad, you can set it to 0.5.
To turn off the word fade effect in lyrics, you can set it to 0.

lyrics.background.fps.description: High performance impact, but generally acceptable. If issues arise, try lowering this value. Default 60.
lyrics.background.render_scale.descripti: High performance impact, but generally acceptable. If issues arise, try lowering this value. Default 1 (per-pixel render).

lyrics.background.static_mode.descriptio: Keep background static except when switching tracks (cover change). Note: Enabling this will disable background bounce effects.
